title: Alfresco Summit in San Francisco
text: Join us in San Francisco on 23-25 of September. Many bees give presentations and participate in this event. Look at our schedule - bees deliver more than 10 presentations! Contact other bees using Gihub Issues or our Mailing list to schedule a beer party during Summit.

title: Alfresco Summit in London
text:
Join us in London on 7-9 of October. Look at our schedule - you can participate only presentations delivered by bees during all Summit!

We are going to drink some beer at October, 7th and 9th. Join us at https://github.com/OrderOfTheBee/marketing/issues/2 to choose the best pub and learn exact time of the party.

title: Order your bee T-Shirt
text:
Now you can order an official Order of the Bee T-shirt at http://skreened.com/ootb. Select black or white design and click 'More Styles' to choose an apparel you like. Take your T-Shirt with you to Alfresco Summit, we are going to make an amazing photo of the Order.

If you don't like SKREENED service, you may take an image from https://github.com/OrderOfTheBee/marketing/tree/master/T-Shirts and print an image yourself using some third-party service.

title: First tutorials in the archive
text: We added first tutorials to our archive. Find information about CMIS, Maven and Aikau at http://orderofthebee.org/archive/. We are working on adding more informative articles and blog posts to the archive.
